sentences.en: Abashed at this question, I answered that sloth was my besetting temptation.
sentences.cn: 这个问题使我感到困窘不安, 我回答说懒惰是我的主要癖好.

sentences.en: All things are easy to industry, all diffcult to sloth.
sentences.cn: 勤劳面前万事易, 懒惰面前万事难.

sentences.en: All things are easy to industry, all things difficult to sloth.
sentences.cn: 勤劳面前万事易, 懒散面前万事难.

sentences.en: He admitted a lack of motivation and a feeling of sloth.
sentences.cn: 他承认自己缺乏动力，总想犯懒。

sentences.en: His sloth keeps him from taking part in sports.
sentences.cn: 他因懒散而不参加体育运动.

sentences.en: I'm a sloth. I see a a leaf. That's my tracking.
sentences.cn: 嘿,我是树懒, 看见树就吃叶子, 我管这叫“追踪 ”

sentences.en: Pure sattva ( harmony ) is perfect freedom sloth and restlessness.
sentences.cn: 纯然的愉悦 ( 和谐 ) 是离诸疲惫及不安而得到完美的自由.

sentences.en: Sloth ( like rust ) consumes faster than labour wears: the used key is always bright.
sentences.cn: 懒惰 ( 像铁锈 ) 比劳动消耗得更快: 使用中的钥匙总是发亮的.

sentences.en: Sloth is the mother of poverty.
Sloth make all thing difficult, but industry all thing easy.
sentences.cn: 勤奋事事易,懒惰事事难.

sentences.en: Sloth makes a 11 things difficult. But industry all things easy.
sentences.cn: 懒惰使一切都难办; 勤奋使事事皆顺利.

sentences.en: Sloth makes all things diffiicult , but industry all things easy.
Sloth turns the edge of wit.
sentences.cn: 懒散能磨去才智的锋芒.

sentences.en: Though the gross there will be the shortage, is own sloth.
sentences.cn: 尽管总会有不足, 是自己的惰性.

sentences.en: Until lately, you led a life of innocent sloth.
sentences.cn: 直到最近, 你过的还都是不问世事的懒散生活.
